dt: {bc}of or relating to a strict sect of Mennonites who were followers of Amman and settled in America chiefly in the 18th century

et: borrowed from German {it}amisch,{/it} from Jacob {it}Amman{/it} died before 1730 Swiss Mennonite elder + {it}-isch{/it} {et_link|-ish|-ish}
shortdef: of or relating to a strict sect of Mennonites who were followers of Amman and settled in America chiefly in the 18th century
